column2: war war war war war war war war war war
Hide Change RGO Options\n\nNote: If you don't see any options, scroll down in your decisions menu to see options that are currently unavailable to you.

Allows the switching of a single colonial RGO province of the following types: Coal, Iron, or Sulphur into Coal, Iron, or Sulphur. This Decision has a 5 year cooldown.\n\nShares cooldowns with §YChange Mining RGO (State)

Allows the switching of a single colonial RGO province of the following types: Grain, Fruit, Fish, Cattle, Wool, Cotton, or Silk into Grain, Fruit, Fish, Cattle, Wool, Cotton, or Silk. This Decision has a 5 year cooldown.\n\nShares cooldowns with §YChange Agriculture RGO (State)

Allows the switching of a single non-colonial RGO province of the following types: Coal, Iron, or Sulphur into Coal, Iron, or Sulphur. This Decision has a 5 year cooldown.\n\nShares cooldowns with §GChange Mining RGO (Colony)

Allows the switching of a single non-colonial RGO province of the following types: Grain, Fruit, Fish, Cattle, Wool, Cotton, or Silk into Grain, Fruit, Fish, Cattle, Wool, Cotton, or Silk. This Decision has a 5 year cooldown.\n\nShares cooldowns with §GChange Agriculture RGO (Colony)

Our Vassals have found a way to use their unique connection to their respective Treaty Ports to encourage population growth!
Consolidate our hold over the Treaty Ports.
No longer can a foreign Nation deny that our Treaty Ports belong to us, for now and forever!
We no longer have need of their special administration over the treaty ports and will integrate fully into our state.

Our kin in Fulo yearn for our protection. So we should grant it.
Stop legal discrimination of the Maghrebi.
The Breton and Welsh peoples will be granted equal rights under our great nation!
We need to expan our foothold in Iberia if we are ever to be truly secure.
With the rising andalucian influence in Iberia we need to defend our brothers in Catalonia by taking them under our wing.
If we are able to control Yemen then the arabian trade to India has to go through us.
India will be declared the crown jewel of our empire.
We really are the rightful rulers of atleast northern Italy. It is time everyone recognizes this.
The swiss and the italians have always been one people. Today our dream of a unified nation-state is realised.
Now that we own Alsace, it is time to make sure the proper people are living it it.
Thank the Hamster or this wouldn't be here
The nuer people are an integral part of our Empire. It is time they are recognized as such.
Our people may live on the other side of the channel, but they are still our people. It is time they are brought into the fold.
Ukranians and Latvians are a brother-people. Anyone who claims otherwise is wrong.
Increases Assimilation of polish pops to our culture.
Increases Assimilation of russian pops to our culture. Remember that Assimilation requires a province to be stated.
We have reestablished control over our home Island. The only question that remains is: "who can stop us from continuing the march west?
The bairisch are not the same as the other so called germans beyond the alps. They can be integrated into our country.
The Hanoveran state has served its purpose. Its time to integrate them into Lavland proper.
The Scandinavian threat is as strong as ever. We need to stand united with the flanish people to defend ourselves.
Now that we own Alsace, it is time to make sure the proper people are living it it.
